meta.brief: General Toolchain *and* Runtime Public API Bits
API for extending the PSPL language
meta.defgroup: pspl_toolchain API for extending the PSPL language

pspl_error.argline: int exit_code, const char* brief, const char* msg, ...
pspl_error.description: Raise globally-recognised error condition (terminating the entire program)

pspl_warn.argline: const char* brief, const char* msg, ...

pspl_malloc_context_init.description: Init Malloc Context for tracking allocated objects

pspl_malloc_context_destroy.description: Destroy Malloc Context and free tracked memory objects with it

args.name: context
args.comment: Context object to add memory object within

pspl_malloc_malloc.description: Allocate memory object and track within context

args.name: context
args.comment: Context object to free memory object from

pspl_hash_cmp.argline: const pspl_hash* a, const pspl_hash* b

return.comment: 0 if identical, positive or negative otherwise

pspl_hash_cmp.description: Compare the contents of two hash objects

pspl_hash_cpy.description: Copy hash to another location in memory

args.name: out
args.comment: String-buffer to fill (allocated to length of `PSPL_HASH_STRING_LEN`)

args.name: out
args.comment: String-buffer containing hash as generated by `pspl_hash_fmt`

args.name: licence
args.comment: Shortest-representable copy of attached licence (line-wrapped to 80 columns)

pspl_toolchain_provide_copyright.comments: Call this method (within copyright hook) for each software component contained in extension or platform

pspl_toolchain_init_other_extension.description: Request the immediate initialisation of another extension by name (only valid within init hook)

args.name: platform_out
args.comment: Output pointer that's set with a reference to the compiled-in platform metadata structure

pspl_runtime_init.comments: Allocates necessary state for the runtime platform compiled into pspl-rt. PSPLP package files may be loaded afterwards.

pspl_runtime_shutdown.comments: Deallocates any objects and archived files owned by the PSPL runtime, closes any open packages, unloads all objects

args.name: package_path
args.comment: path (absolute or relative to working directory) expressing location to PSPLP file

pspl_runtime_load_package_file.argline: const char* package_path, const pspl_runtime_package_t** package_out
pspl_runtime_load_package_file.description: Load a PSPLP package file using <stdio.h> routines

args.name: package_path
args.comment: path expressing location to PSPLP file (supplied to 'open' hook)

args.name: data_provider_handle
args.comment: application-allocated handle object for use with provided hooks

args.name: data_provider_hooks
args.comment: application-populated data structure with hook implementations for data-handling routines

pspl_runtime_load_package_provider.description: Load a PSPLP package file using data-providing hook routines provided by application

args.name: package_len
args.comment: length of PSPLP buffer in memory

pspl_runtime_load_package_membuf.argline:
const void* package_data, size_t package_len,
                                     const pspl_runtime_package_t** package_out
pspl_runtime_load_package_membuf.description: Load a PSPLP package file from application-provided memory buffer

pspl_runtime_unload_package.comments: Frees all allocated objects represented through this package. All extension and platform runtimes will be instructed to unload their instances of the objects.

args.name: hook
args.comment: Function to call for each PSPLC

args.name: key
args.comment: Key-string to hash and use to look up PSPLC representation

args.name: retain
args.comment: If non-zero, the PSPLC representation will have internal reference count set to 1 when found

pspl_runtime_get_psplc_from_key.argline:
const pspl_runtime_package_t* package,
                                                            const char* key, int retain

return.comment: PSPLC representation (or NULL if not available)

pspl_runtime_get_psplc_from_key.description: Get PSPLC representation from key string and optionally perform retain

args.name: hash
args.comment: Hash to use to look up PSPLC representation

args.name: retain
args.comment: If non-zero, the PSPLC representation will have internal reference count set to 1 when found

pspl_runtime_get_psplc_from_hash.argline:
const pspl_runtime_package_t* package,
                                                             pspl_hash* hash, int retain

return.comment: PSPLC representation (or NULL if not available)

pspl_runtime_get_psplc_from_hash.description: Get PSPLC representation from hash and optionally perform retain

args.name: hook
args.comment: Function to call for each file

args.name: hash
args.comment: Hash to use to look up archived file

args.name: retain
args.comment: If non-zero, the archived file will have internal reference count set to 1 when found

pspl_runtime_get_archived_file_from_hash.argline:
const pspl_runtime_package_t* package,
                                                                        pspl_hash* hash, int retain

return.comment: File representation (or NULL if not available)

pspl_runtime_get_archived_file_from_hash.description: Get archived file from hash and optionally perform retain

types.block:
int(*open)(void* handle, const char* path)
void(*close)(const void* handle)
size_t(*len)(const void* handle)
int(*seek)(const void* handle, size_t seek_set)
size_t(*read)(const void* handle, size_t num_bytes, const void** data_out)

const char* extension_name
const char* extension_desc
# ifdef PSPL_TOOLCHAIN const struct _pspl_toolchain_extension* toolchain_extension
# endif # ifdef PSPL_RUNTIME const struct _pspl_runtime_extension* runtime_extension
# endif
types.comments:
Common extension definition structure

Instances of this structure are generated before compile time
via CMake. The structure is shared between the *Toolchain* and
*Runtime* portions of PSPL, thereby maintaining a common extension
namespace.

types.block:
const char* platform_name
const char* platform_desc
uint8_t byte_order
uint8_t padding[3]
# ifdef PSPL_TOOLCHAIN const struct _pspl_toolchain_platform* toolchain_platform
# endif # ifdef PSPL_RUNTIME const struct _pspl_runtime_platform* runtime_platform
# endif
types.comments:
Common platform description structure

Instances of this structure are generated before compile time
via CMake. The structure is shared between the *Toolchain* and
*Runtime* portions of PSPL, thereby maintaining a common platform
namespace.

types.block:
pspl_hash hash
size_t file_len
const void* file_data
types.comments:
Archived file object (from PSPLP)
Holds state information about file during runtime

PSPLC runtime representation (from PSPLC)
Holds state information about object during runtime

types.block:
unsigned int target_runtime_platforms_c
const pspl_platform_t* const * target_runtime_platforms
const char* pspl_name
const char* pspl_enclosing_dir
unsigned int def_c
const char** def_k
const char** def_v
types.comments: Toolchain driver context (data consistent from init to finish)
